title: Ahri's passive
body:
Hi,

Not sure where to post this, but in recent games, I've noticed that Ahri's passive is bugged. (Not sure if it's just me) The AP scaling on it is always '0' regardless of current AP. eg. ...heals for 5 (+0).

Hope someone finds it and fixes it.

Thx xx

replies.body:
Hey there,

It's possible that it's simply the displaying of the current value that is bugged. Have you tested to see if it is still applying the AP ratio?

If not, please [submit a bug report here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report), don't forget to read the [How to Report a Game Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/3mQGBEjA-how-to-report-a-game-bug) thread before posting to ensure your post meets expectations.
